sentence.Network_en: Dividing his command, Morgan assailed both strongholds at the same time.
sentence.Network_cn: 摩根派遣部队同时袭击了两个据点。

sentence.Network_en: Our economics correspondent, James Morgan, is just back from Germany.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的财经记者詹姆斯·摩根刚刚从德国回来。

sentence.Network_en: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.--J.P. Morgan
sentence.Network_cn: 迈向任何地方的第一步，就是下决心不在原地踏步。

centimorgan, cM 厘摩 : 遗传图距(map distance)或是染色体上的辜的距离以摩尔根单位(Morgan unit)表示,等于100%的重组率(交换值),1分摩图距(dM)等于10%的.
